p: For example, in order to evaluate the antioxidant activity of two quinoline isolated alkaloids from Zanthoxylum rhetsa root bark, Zohora and collaborators showed through DPPH assay that the compounds 8-methoxy- N-methylflindersine (4) and zanthodioline (5) ( Figure 1) presented free radical scavenging activity (IC 50 in μg/mL) of 71.18 ± 1.74 and 101.90 ± 5.24, respectively, reveling potent antioxidant activity [ 38].
